'''Chuck''' is a man who was beating his wife.

==History==
Chuck was beating his wife when [[Travis Montgomery]] heard her screams and broke into the house. He then tackled Chuck and told Jane to run, so she could escape.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to a woman named Jane.
